code: import React from'react';import Slider from'react-slick';import"slick-carousel/slick/slick.css";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css";import image2 from"../../sliderImgs/1.jpg";import image1 from"../../sliderImgs/5.jpg";import image3 from"../../sliderImgs/6.jpg";import image4 from"../../sliderImgs/7.jpg";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ImgSlider=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();let settings={dots:true,infinite:true,speed:500,slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1,autoplay:true};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-slider",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Slider,{className:"carousel",...settings,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image1,alt:"Slider Image 1",loading:"lazy"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image2,alt:"Slider Image 2"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image3,alt:"Slider Image 3"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image4,alt:"Slider Image 4"})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-class",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:t('slider.heading')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:t('slider.subheading')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/all-car",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:t('slider.buttonText')})})]})]});};export default ImgSlider;
